title: Prohibits certain trucks with trailers from operating upon certain public highways
summary: Prohibits any truck with a trailer exceeding 48 feet in length from operating upon that part of route 41 or 41-A located between route 20 and route 281 in the counties of Onondaga or Cortland, absent a local law to the contrary.
actClause: AN ACT in relation to prohibiting certain trucks with trailers from operating upon a certain portion of public highway in the counties of Onondaga and Cortland
